      • connect

        public org.xlattice.Connection connect(java.net.InetAddress nearHost,
                              int nearPort,
                              boolean blocking)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a Connection to the server from the local Address specified. If the nearPort is zero, the operating system picks an unused ephemeral port number. Normally nearPort should be zero.
        Parameters:
        nearHost - one of this host's Internet names or IP addresses
        nearPort - the port used; usually 0
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
